sources.title: The Gallant Fool (1933) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
MURDER MYSTERY COWBOY CLASSIC
Stars: Bob Steele, Arletta Duncan, George Gabby Hayes
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

As part of a traveling circus, a cowboy returns to the town where he is wanted for murder. After an old enemy recognizes him without his clown makeup, he sets out to kill him during his high-wire act!

metadata.Plot: As part of Rainey's circus, Dad Denton returns to the town where he is supposedly wanted for murder. When his old enemy McDonald spots him with out his clown makeup, he sets his men up to murder him during his high wire act at the next performance.
metadata.Writer: Robert N. Bradbury, John P. McCarthy, Harry L. Fraser
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Arletta Duncan, George 'Gabby' Hayes
